EmailTemplate.description: Flow: Template used in Registration Flow
EmailTemplate.name: SR Registration Existing
EmailTemplate.subject: Students Rebuild Registration - Welcome Back!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Welcome Back to Students Rebuild!
Thanks for signing up for the Ocean Challenge. As you may know, this is more than an art project, it’s a global community—so we're glad you're back.
You'll find everything you need to dive into our new Ocean Challenge on our Resource Page (http://www.studentsrebuild.org/resources). From our Leader Guide with in-depth Challenge details, to new Teaching Guides based on the time you have, to special videos—we've created all these tools with you in mind.
Have a question about the Challenge? Find the answer here (http://www.studentsrebuild.org/ocean-faq) or email us (info@studentsrebuild.org).
Don't forget to share photos of the sea creatures you make on social media using #SROCEAN (and make sure to tag @StudentsRebuild)!
We are so happy you've joined us again.
The Students Rebuild Team
Registration Form Details {!CampaignMember.SR_FormData__c}
